headline: Duolingo Valuation Tested As AI Translation Competition Intensifies
summary: T-Mobile recently launched an AI driven real time translation service, highlighting growing competition for Duolingo's language learning offering. Goldman Sachs added Duolingo (NasdaqGS:DUOL) to its "AI disruption" short basket, signaling rising concern about the impact of generative AI tools on the business. These developments have renewed investor focus on Duolingo's resilience against large tech and telecom players entering adjacent language and translation services. For investors...
